titles.title: Electronic Life Safety and Security Systems Federal Background Check Act of 2009

To direct the Attorney General to establish a system of background checks for employers and employees of the electronic life safety and security system installation and monitoring industry, and for other purposes.
Electronic Life Safety and Security Systems Federal Background Check Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Electronic Life Safety and Security Systems Federal Background Check Act of 2009 - Directs the Attorney General to establish a method to permit employers in the electronic life safety and security systems installation and monitoring industry to access criminal history records and other information to conduct background checks of prospective employees.
